trans-unit.source: Provides a set of properties, such as flow direction, alignment, or indentation, that can be applied to a paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組屬性，例如方向、 對齊或縮排，可套用至段落。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 這是 abstract 類別。

trans-unit.source: To create a text layout application that uses the services of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> object, you must create a derived class that implements the methods of the TextParagraphProperties abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立文字版面配置應用程式使用的服務<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>物件，您必須建立衍生的類別的實作方法的 TextParagraphProperties 抽象類別。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a formatted line can always be collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已格式化的線條一律可摺疊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the formatted line can always be collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which indicates that only formatted lines that overflow the paragraph width are collapsed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果格式化的行一律可以摺疊。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，表示會摺疊溢位的段落寬度只格式化的行。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default incremental tab distance.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設索引標籤累加距離。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the default incremental tab distance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>值，表示預設增量的索引標籤的距離。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default text run properties, such as typeface or foreground brush.
trans-unit.target: 取得的預設文字往返的屬性，例如字樣或前景的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the text run is the first line of the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出段落的第一行是否包含文字往返。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the text run is the first line of the paragraph; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文字往返的段落; 第一行否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the primary text advance direction shall be left-to-right, or right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定是否主要文字方向應該左到右或從右到左。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值<xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of line indentation.
trans-unit.target: 取得行縮排數量。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the amount of line indentation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，代表行縮排數量。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a line of text.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字行高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the height of a line of text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，代表行文字的高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of the paragraph indentation.
trans-unit.target: 取得段落縮排數量。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the amount of the paragraph indentation.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示段落縮排數量。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of tab definitions.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引標籤上定義的集合。

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabProperties"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabProperties"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that describes how an inline content of a block is aligned.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，描述在區塊的內嵌內容對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.TextAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值<xref href="System.Windows.TextAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies marker characteristics of the first line in the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定在一段中的第一行標記特性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextMarkerProperties"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextMarkerProperties"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that controls whether text wraps when it reaches the flow edge of its containing block box.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，控制時達到流量邊緣，其包含的區塊方塊的文字是否換行。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.TextWrapping"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值<xref href="System.Windows.TextWrapping"> </xref>。
